name: @email-gateway/email-alias-extensions
description: Browser extensions for generating email aliases.

scripts.type-check:all: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run type-check:test
scripts.check: pnpm run format && pnpm run type-check:all && pnpm run lint && pnpm run test
scripts.check:ci: pnpm run type-check:all && pnpm run lint:ci && pnpm run test
scripts.ci: pnpm run check:ci && pnpm run build
scripts.validate: pnpm run check && pnpm run build
scripts.release-dist: pnpm run zip && gh release upload $npm_package_name@$npm_package_version dist.zip --clobber
scripts.release-chrome: pnpm run zip-chrome && gh release upload $npm_package_name@$npm_package_version chrome-extention.zip --clobber
scripts.release-firefox: pnpm run zip-firefox && gh release upload $npm_package_name@$npm_package_version firefox-extention.zip --clobber
scripts.postrelease: pnpm run release-dist && pnpm run release-chrome && pnpm run release-firefox && pnpm run release-extn-config

_scripts_documentation.build: Builds the browser extensions for all supported browsers.
_scripts_documentation.type-check: Performs a type check on the main source code.
_scripts_documentation.type-check:test: Performs a type check on the test files.
_scripts_documentation.type-check:all: Performs type checks on both main source code and test files.
_scripts_documentation.lint:fix: Lints and automatically fixes fixable issues using Biome.
_scripts_documentation.lint:unsafe_fix: Lints and automatically fixes fixable and potentially unsafe issues using Biome.
_scripts_documentation.lint:ci: Lints the code for CI environments.
_scripts_documentation.test:watch: Runs tests in watch mode using Vitest.
_scripts_documentation.check: Run all checks (format, types, lint, tests) - for development
_scripts_documentation.check:ci: Runs type checks, linting, and tests for CI environments.
_scripts_documentation.ci: Runs all CI checks and builds the extensions.
_scripts_documentation.validate: Run all CI checks including build - for development
_scripts_documentation.prepublishOnly: Runs before npm publish to ensure quality
_scripts_documentation.postversion: Syncs the manifest.json version with the package.json version after a version bump.
_scripts_documentation.zip-chrome: Zips the Chrome extension files into chrome-extention.zip.
_scripts_documentation.zip-firefox: Zips the Firefox extension files into firefox-extention.zip.
_scripts_documentation.zip: Zip Dist directory into dist.zip for release.
_scripts_documentation.postrelease: Runs after github release by changesets
